author: vaibhav_arora
title: Passport power index
text: # 1 This report by Arton capital (a firm whose name I had never heard till today), states that Indian passport holders can visit 59 countries sans prior visa approval and stamping. The first place on the Arton capital index is held by US and UK passports - 147 countries welcome the holders of those passports sans a pre-approved and stamped visa. It's being much bandied about on Indian websites for reasons I do not understand. Meanwhile, I welcome any information on a passport that enables the holder to travel ticket free. A list of those visa free countries is seen here - the list includes countries that issue an eVisa or a VoA -
